hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn 'Abbas:I saw that during the time of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) the people were beaten when they bought grain on the same spot and sold it there without moving it to their houses

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي بَيْعِ الطَّعَامِ قَبْلَ أَنْ يُسْتَوْفَى
chapter.eng-name: Regarding Selling Food Before Taking Possession Of It
